statements: DELETE FROM robotic_arm_sensor_data WHERE arm_position_x < 0 AND arm_position_y > 0
DELETE FROM robotic_arm_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM robotic_arm_analysis WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM robotic_arm_sensor_data WHERE position_y > 50);
DELETE FROM arm_calibration WHERE angle > 45 AND sensor_id = 'c094e98e-ee2f-4e4e-bc68-8ce82dbe0010';
DELETE FROM arm_calibration WHERE angle > 90 AND torque < 50;
DELETE FROM robotic_arm_movements WHERE arm_id = 3 AND movement_type = 'Rotate' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM robotic_arm_movements WHERE movement_id = 5 AND arm_id = 2;
DELETE FROM robotic_arm_movements WHERE timestamp < '2022-05-01' AND movement_type = 'rotate';
